title: 56.08 ANNUAL LICENSE FEE.
text: Every licensee shall, on or before the 20th day of each December, pay to the commissioner the sum of $150 as an annual license fee for the next succeeding calendar year.

variables.name: current_date
variables.description: The current day of the month.

variables.name: current_month
variables.description: The current month of the year.

consequences: The licensee must pay $150 to the commissioner as an annual license fee for the next calendar year.
